education.institution: Hanoi University of Science and Technology

publications.name: Striking the perfect balance: Multi-objective optimization for minimizing deployment cost and maximizing coverage with Harmony Search
publications.publisher: Journal of Network and Computer Applications
publications.summary: It proposes various enhancements for Harmony Search to solve a multi-objective optimization problem in heterogeneous wireless sensor networks.

publications.name: Efficiency-preserving Scene-adaptive Object Detection
publications.publisher: In Proceedings of British Machine Vision Conference 2024
publications.summary: In this paper, the authors propose MoE architecture to split some initial and terminal layers of a detector to adapt the base model to various scenes without increasing the latency too much.

publications.name: Node placement optimization under Q-Coverage and Q-Connectivity constraints in wireless sensor networks
publications.publisher: Journal of Network and Computer Applications
publications.summary: The authors propose a two-phase heuristic algorithm to solve Q-Coverage and Q-Connectivity problem in wireless sensor networks based on graph theory and clustering technique.

publications.name: SPARTA-GEMSTONE: A two-phase approach for efficient node placement in 3D WSNs under Q-Coverage and Q-Connectivity constraints
publications.publisher: Journal of Network and Computer Applications
publications.summary: The authors propose a two-phase heuristic algorithm to solve the node placement optimization problem in 3D wireless sensor networks.

publications.name: Low-Rank Prompt Adaptation for Open-Vocabulary Object Detection
publications.summary: The authors propose a lightweight prompt enhancer module for open-vocabulary object detection.

publications.name: STEAM: Securing the connections in wireless sensor networks with varying target priority
publications.summary: The authors propose a graph-based algorithm to tackle Q-Secure Connectivity problem in wireless sensor networks.
